other_tests.findings: Retinal degeneration surrounding the vascular arcade with cystic changes in both maculae.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Clumped pigmentation has appeared in the retinal degeneration, and the cystic changes in the foveal region have become ambiguous.

other_tests.findings: Unique responses corresponding to Enhanced S-cone Syndrome.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased retinal sensitivity and attenuation of flash ERG amplitude during the 2-decade follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Diffuse mild retinal degeneration with no pigmentation in both eyes.
Subtle foveal schisis in the left eye; outer nuclear layer structure relatively well maintained.
Novel nucleotide substitution (c.151G>A) in exon 2 resulting in a missense mutation (p.G51R).
Compound heterozygous mutations (p.R48C in exon 2 and p.R104Q in exon 3).
